text: Carina Driscoll is an American politician. She was a State Representative in the Vermont House of Representatives for the Chittenden District from 2001 to 2003. She is a co-founder of Vermont Woodworking school with her husband Blake Ewoldson. She unsuccessfully ran for Mayor of Burlington, Vermont in 2018. She is the stepdaughter of U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders and daughter of Jane O'Meara Sanders. == References == Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Vermont Category:People from Burlington, Vermont Category:Bernie Sanders
title: Carina Driscoll
